title: Understanding the Subtle Bodies: Exploring Ancient Beliefs and Practices.
first_phrase: In the previous section of the text, it was stated how advanced civilizations have had access to the science of chakras and subtle bodies. In the last 200 tokens, the author will delve into different approaches to the subtle bodies, as there have been several in the past. This section will also cover how different cultures and beliefs, including gnosis, ancient medicine, and Hinduism, have contributed to our understanding of the subtle body system.
content: Ces corps ont un rôle premier dans le magnétisme. Ils le renforcent. D’autres l’ont retrouvé en décortiquant d’anciens livres. Dés lors, quelques penseurs n’ont pas hésité à réhabiliter l’aspect énergétique de l’homme. last_phrase: In conclusion, the existence of subtle bodies is a reality that can be experienced through one's feelings and certain magnetic practices. While it may be easier to understand this concept intellectually, nothing compares to the experience of feeling their existence. The rediscovery of the science of subtle bodies by scholars in the 19th century and the revival of the energetic aspect of man by Helena Blavatsky, Rudolph Steiner, Mircea Eliade, and others prove that the tradition of hermeticism is not dead.
